description: This file provides functions for authentication-related operations in a frontend application, including login, registration, profile fetching, and logout, by interacting with backend API endpoints.

methods.name: login(email, password)
methods.description: Logs in a user by sending email and password to the backend, then stores the received token and user data.

methods.name: register({ name, email, password })
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided name, email, and password and returns the backend response.

methods.name: fetchProfile(token)
methods.description: Fetches the profile of the logged-in user using authentication token.

methods.name: logout()
methods.description: Clears stored authentication credentials and user data from client storage.

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^export async function register({ name, email, password }) {$/
